personalInfo.name: Akshat Thakkar
personalInfo.title: Software Developer | ML & Data Analyst | Full Stack Developer

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: A passionate software developer with expertise in Machine Learning, Data Analysis, and Full Stack Development.

faqs.question: What are my key skills?
faqs.answer: I'm proficient in Java, Python, SQL, C, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js, FastAPI, MySQL, MongoDB, and various developer tools.  My expertise spans full-stack development, machine learning, and data analysis.

faqs.question: What kind of projects have I worked on?
faqs.answer: I've developed a state-city-wise news portal, analyzed Lok Sabha data to study voting trends, built a fake news detection system, and created an e-waste facility locator.

faqs.question: What is my experience?
faqs.answer: I've completed internships as a Full Stack Developer and Data Analyst at Grownited Private Limited, gaining hands-on experience in various technologies and methodologies.

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.subtitle: My professional journey and the skills I've acquired along the way

description: Developed StateBuzz, a state-city-wise news portal using the FARM stack (FastAPI, ReactJS, MongoDB).
Built modules for auth, role-based dashboards, news posting, and comments.
Integrated Cloudinary for image uploads and added email alerts (signup, approval, reset).
Gained hands-on experience with REST APIs, React components, and FastAPI routing.
Analyzed Lok Sabha data (2004-2024) to study voting trends, turnout, and party performance.
Applied statistical methods and hypothesis testing for deeper insights.
Utilized Python (Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn) for data preprocessing and visual exploration.
Created interactive Power BI dashboards to present findings.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my technical skills and creative problem-solving abilities

items.title: Fake News Detection using Machine Learning
items.description: Built an ML pipeline to classify news as fake or real using TF-IDF vectorization and Logistic Regression.

items.title: E-Waste Facility Locator
items.description: Developed an application using React.js to help users find e-waste disposal facilities.

items.title: CRUD Application
items.description: Built a secure CRUD system for managing student records using Java, JSP, and MySQL.
